include-cursor.description: Whether to include mouse cursor in screenshot

open-after.description: Whether to open the screenshot in file manager

delay-seconds.description: How many seconds to wait before taking a screenshot

capture-window-as-area.description: Whether to use area selection for window captures

include-window-frame.description: Whether to include the window frame and titlebar in window captures

use-camera-flash.description: Whether to show a bright flash over the capture area

show-capture-timer.description: Whether to show the timer on the screen

play-shutter-sound.description: Whether to play the shutter sound as the capture is made

play-timer-interval-sound.description: Whether to play the timer interval sound as the timer counts down

copy-to-clipboard.description: Whether to copy path/filename of screenshots to clipboard after capture

upload-to-imgur.description: Whether to upload all captures to imgur.com
upload-to-imgur.help: If enabled, all captures will be uploaded to imgur. The view and delete URLs for each capture are stored in a file imgur.log in the capture save directory.

send-notification.description: Whether to send a notification to desktop after capture

include-styles.description: Whether to include CSS selection styles in Cinnamon UI screenshots

mod-activates-timer.description: Whether to only activate timer when Shift key is held

last-selected-page.description: Last selected page (tab index) of settings application

last-selected-subpage.description: Last selected sub-page (tab index) of settings application

use-symbolic-icon.description: Whether to use symbolic (black and white) icon for applet
